response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its high value and potential impact on your operations, I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value, making it an excellent opportunity for you. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or if you have any questions. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 12000}
